pages.title: Nasca Dopant
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W (2009, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:w/devices/gaia_driver#gaia_driver_nasca)Gaia Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash III$(li)Strength III (with sword)$(li)Strength (with empty hand)$(li)Speed II$(li)Jump Boost II$(li)Flying
